metadata.title: CVE-2024-45845 on Ubuntu 22.04 FIPS Compliant (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: nix 2.24 through 2.24.5 allows directory traversal via a symlink in a narfile, because of mishandling of a directory containing a symlink and adirectory of the same name, aka GHSA-h4vv-h3jq-v493.

criterions.comment: nix package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
